newsitem.title: USA: Spiegel's Eddie Bauer May same-store rise.
newsitem.headline: Spiegel's Eddie Bauer May same-store rise.

text.p: Spiegel Inc said same-store sales for its Eddie Bauer unit rose seven percent for the four weeks ended May 24.
For the 21 weeks ended May 24, same-store sales at the Eddie Bauer unit increased three percent.

Total May Spiegel sales were $205.5 million, up one percent from sales of $203.1 million in the same period last year. For the 21 weeks ended May 24, total sales were $957.5 million, a decrease of two percent from sales of $976.0 million for the same period last year.

"Lower sales in the Spiegel Catalog division continue to negatively affect total sales. However, despite the unseasonably cool weather, Eddie Bauer retail sales were strong and inventory levels are on plan," Spiegel said.
